back_cards.example_en: The novel’s setting was a coastal town.
He changed the setting on the thermostat.
The meeting’s setting was a conference room.
The film’s setting was a desert.
The play’s setting was the 1920s.
They held a ceremony in her honor.
She acted with honor in the dispute.
It was an honor to speak at the event.
The monument was built in honor of peace.
The judge was addressed as ‘Your Honor’.
The gallery displayed her works.
The watch’s works needed repair.
His charitable works benefited many.
The steel works employed hundreds.
The library holds Shakespeare’s works.
Unfortunately, the concert was postponed.
He tried, but unfortunately failed the test.
Unfortunately, we missed the flight.
The car broke down, unfortunately.
Unfortunately, I’m unavailable tomorrow.

back_cards.definition_en: The central idea of a work
back_cards.example_en: The theme of the story was love.
The party had a beach theme.
Justice was a theme in his speeches.
The theme played during the movie’s opening.
The course’s theme was sustainability.
The team addressed the issue of delays.
Poverty is a key issue in the campaign.
I read the latest issue of the journal.
She’s facing some family issues.
The bank issued new cards.
The male athletes trained separately.
The male lead was a brave character.
The male lion roared loudly.
He wore a male cologne.
The study targeted male participants.
The house was clean after scrubbing.
The stream provided clean water.
Her workspace was clean and neat.
The game was played clean.
The logo had a clean design.
The united group achieved their goal.
They were united on the decision.
A united effort rebuilt the school.
The United Nations held a summit.
Their united vision inspired change.

back_cards.definition_en: A body of water for swimming
back_cards.example_en: The kids played in the pool.
The company has a pool of talent.
They played pool at the club.
She was in the pool for the job.
A pool of oil leaked from the car.
The museum offered educational programs.
The video was highly educational.
They purchased educational tools.
Reading is an educational habit.
The talk was educational for parents.
The glass was empty after lunch.
The park was empty at dawn.
His words felt empty to her.
The empty seat was taken quickly.
She felt empty after the news.
The chair was soft and comfortable.
He felt comfortable in the new team.
These shoes are comfortable for hiking.
They lived a comfortable life.
She was comfortable at the party.
Police investigated the theft.
She investigated ancient ruins.
They investigated the system failure.
Scientists investigated the virus.
He investigated the product’s safety.
The map was useful for navigation.
This tool is useful for repairs.
Her skills were useful in the project.
The app is useful for learning.
The advice was useful for planning.

back_cards.definition_en: A small sewn bag in clothing
back_cards.example_en: He put his phone in his pocket.
She paid from her own pocket.
A pocket of air was trapped inside.
The backpack had a side pocket.
The ball rolled into the pocket.
He bought a digital watch.
The display showed digital numbers.
She works in digital advertising.
The library offers digital books.
The classroom used digital tools.
There was plenty of cake for everyone.
The garden had plenty of flowers.
We have plenty of time to prepare.
The city offers plenty for tourists.
She packed plenty of snacks.
The room was entirely silent.
The choice was entirely hers.
The event was entirely successful.
He was entirely committed.
The building was entirely restored.
Fear gripped her in the dark.
His fear of flying was intense.
The storm caused fear in the village.
Her fear of dogs was lifelong.
Fear led them to stay indoors.
She can afford a vacation this year.
The job affords travel benefits.
They couldn’t afford a new laptop.
He couldn’t afford to lose focus.
We can’t afford another delay.
She stirred sugar into her tea.
The drink was high in sugar.
He called her ‘sugar’ playfully.
The cake needed more sugar.
The juice had natural sugar.
Her teaching engaged the students.
Teaching was her lifelong passion.
His teaching focused on empathy.
Her teaching used real-world examples.
The book’s teaching was inspiring.
He held conservative views on marriage.
She took a conservative approach to risks.
The conservative candidate won.
The policy was conservative in scope.
Her outfit was conservative for work.
The chairman called the meeting to order.
She was the chairman of the board.
The chairman presented the findings.
He was chairman of the company.
The chairman announced new rules.
The error in the code caused a crash.
The app failed due to an error.
His choice was an error of judgment.
The sign had a spelling error.
The error lost them the match.
The bridge spanned the river.
She built a bridge between teams.
The song’s bridge was catchy.
They enjoyed playing bridge.
The dentist fitted a bridge.
The tall building dominated the skyline.
He was tall for his class.
The tall tower was a landmark.
That’s a tall story about aliens.
She stood tall in her leadership role.
He asked specifically for black coffee.
The rule was made specifically for safety.
She explained the plan specifically.
The ad was specifically for students.
The study was specifically about birds.
She planted flowers in her garden.
He gave her flowers for Valentine’s Day.
The flowers brightened the room.
Wild flowers grew in the field.
The flower bloomed in March.
It was cold, though she went swimming.
He studied, though he didn’t pass.
The task was easy, though slow.
I’ll come, though I’m tired.
It’s nice, though expensive.
The universe is billions of years old.
She explored the universe of art.
Scientists study the universe’s origins.
The movie created a fantasy universe.
The job opened a universe of opportunities.
The fish live in clean water.
They live in a quiet suburb.
She lives for adventure.
The band will play live tonight.
He lives on a small income.
She acknowledged her mistake.
He acknowledged their support.
I acknowledged the package delivery.
She acknowledged him with a nod.
The writer acknowledged her sources.
The limit for luggage is 50 pounds.
There’s a limit to my patience.
His budget reached its limit.
The game has a player limit.
The law sets limits on noise.
The news gave coverage to the event.
Her plan included dental coverage.
The phone had poor coverage in the hills.
Snow coverage closed the roads.
The book’s coverage of history was thorough.
The film crew worked long hours.
The ship’s crew sailed at dawn.
The road crew fixed the potholes.
Her crew met at the café.
The crew set up the festival stage.
She located her keys under the couch.
The shop is located downtown.
He located his phone with an app.
They located the noise in the engine.
The factory was located near the river.
She kept her balance on the beam.
The budget needs balance to work.
The balance measured the ingredients.
He sought balance between work and home.
Her account balance was low.
They shared the prize in equal parts.
The law treats everyone as equal.
Their skills were equal in the contest.
All are equal in a democracy.
The teams were equal in strength.
